products.name: Floral Blouse
products.description: A beautiful floral blouse that is perfect for adding a pop of color to your outfit. Features a loose fit and v-neckline.

products.name: Knit Cardigan
products.description: A cozy and chic knit cardigan that features a button-down front and ribbed trim. Perfect for layering.

products.name: Wrap Dress
products.description: A versatile and stylish wrap dress that is perfect for any occasion. Features a flattering wrap silhouette and short sleeves.

products.name: Off-Shoulder Top
products.description: A trendy off-shoulder top that features a smocked neckline and elasticated cuffs. Perfect for a day out with friends.

products.name: Faux Leather Jacket
products.description: A sleek and stylish faux leather jacket that features a zippered front and belted waist. Perfect for adding edge to any outfit.

products.name: Ruffle Sleeve Top
products.description: A feminine and chic ruffle sleeve top that features a round neckline and relaxed fit. Perfect for dressing up or down.
